alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Pike; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 8:42AM EDT until June 29 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 AM CDT/900 AM EDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN WARRICK...SOUTHEASTERN GIBSON AND SOUTHERN PIKE COUNTIES... At 742 AM CDT/842 AM EDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oakland City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Oakland City, Lynnville, Winslow, Francisco, Somerville, Spurgeon and Mackey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between Mile Markers 25 and 40. Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 41 and 51. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
